name: Cosmic Kid
bio:
Blackholes • Night Skies • Beaches.

The life of a sandy cosmic kid.

top_projects.name: phonecodes
top_projects.description: A Dart & Flutter package that provides a list of Countries with their name, ISO code, Dial code, Flag.

top_projects.name: VintageRealEstateUI
top_projects.description: Flutter Everyday - Day 3 🦄 Real Estate App Design by @uk_designer7970! 🎨

top_projects.name: CalculatorUI
top_projects.description: Just a Calculator UI with Flutter. Inspired by @juliejamolo's design.

top_projects.name: BitLinker
top_projects.description: Just a Telegram Bot to shorten your long links!

top_projects.name: Rustling
top_projects.description: Just my space for learning Rust with examples, tutorials, and things ⚙️

top_projects.name: gemchat
top_projects.description: GemChat is a Telegram Bot powered with new Google Generative AI package for Dart. The bot let's you seamlessly chat with Gemini model through Telegram.

profile_summary:
Cosmic Kid is a highly skilled developer with a strong background in programming languages such as Rust, Dart, and C. With a significant presence on GitHub, boasting 72 followers and 68 public repositories, Cosmic Kid has established themselves as a prominent figure in the development community. Their technical expertise is complemented by a unique blend of creativity and passion, as reflected in their bio, which reveals a fascination with the mysteries of the universe, from blackholes to night skies, and a love for the serenity of beaches.

As a seasoned developer, Cosmic Kid brings a high level of expertise and innovation to the table, with a strong focus on delivering high-quality solutions. With a proven track record of active development and a robust professional network, Cosmic Kid is well-equipped to tackle complex projects and collaborate with like-minded individuals. Their proficiency in Rust, Dart, and C, combined with their enthusiasm for exploring the intersection of technology and the natural world, makes them a valuable asset to any development team, and a reliable partner for businesses and individuals seeking cutting-edge solutions.
